name: Neural Planet
description:
Edit the data of a Neural Planet to make the different different planet differenter!

Game made for the Beginner's Circle Jam #3.

Made by:

  • Batho: Main programming, sprite work.
  • pepsicocapepper: Main spritework, programming, sound design.

Music by:

  • http://nosoapradio.us/
  • http://ericskiff.com/music/

Controls:

  • E: Interact
  • A/D(W/S): Move
  • Space: Jump
  • R: Restart level
  • Mouse: Edit terminals
  • ESC: Close terminal
